welcome.sectionDescription: Self-thought nerd with 22+ years of experience (in gaming). I am always ready for new challenges, reaching for the highest level. I never back down from fighting, not even from the scariest Bug. When it comes to a difficult task, teamwork wins ! So let’s have a chat, build a hero team to fight bugs and make the world a better place !

skill.description: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak.

itemList.label: Skills I'd love to get better at

moreInfoList: The learning project achieved Zero technical dept through refactoring the web application using React, Redux, NodeJS, HTML, CSS
We’ve also managed to speed up executing tasks and deliver more features to the client by adopting and implementing Material UI library which allowed us to focus on feature implementation.
Update the interfaces with the new look and do bug fixing ,pixel perfect ,using React and Jsx
Making decisions on various challenging issues that arise on a daily basis.
Brought in new technologies like Pug and Sass to improve web platforms.
Changed the UI for better interaction and flow. Implemented mobile first approach and responsive web design to improve the user interface and increase the conversion rate.
Design user interface and other custom designs using Photoshop, Illustrator.
Ongoing premium service to keep the website up-to-date, including website’s WordPress core
Encouraging traffic growth and making sure Google is happy to make my client happy .
Regularly checking the websites for issues and mistakes, keeping it updated and relevant.
